name: Sand City (Retirement City Builder)
description:
Controls
  • W,S,A,D or arrow keys to walk
  • Mouse to look around
  • Right click while looking at empty lot and standing near to open build menu
  • Buildings cost 20
Gameplay
  • Build a shop as one of the fist two to generate money
  • Farms produce food and you need to food and apartment space to have new people
  • Apartments allow more people capacity 
  • Shops generate money
